name: zkApes
intro: Metaverse project built on zkSync L2
introduce: zkApes is a metaverse project built on zkSync L2. zkApes is developing 9999 dynamic NFTs (dNFT), and every Ape is original and unique. zkApes is developing a metaverse called Apeverse, where you can exchange your NFT(AMM), play games, and make money in Apeverse.
